title: At draft mode, my turn to ban / pick isnt popping up
body: When I play ranked, (I didnt try it on normal draft) my turn to ban / pick isnt popping up and i cant select / ban any champ so its like i doged the champ select. riot said that they awere about this problem but i still cant pick my champ at draft mode.

replies.body: The previous status page messaging was in regards to the pop up notification for your turn, not selection.  Your specific issue sounds like an unstable connection causing you to lose sync during champion select, and kicking you off.  I recommend going over each instruction found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.  Do it in a custom though to prevent any penalties!
